gridData.name: closable
gridData.description: This flag will make tab closable, applicable for all tab pills.

gridData.name: header-align
gridData.description: Specify position of tabs(left/right).

gridData.name: action
gridData.description: This flag ensures the action Component

gridData.name: divide-header-equally
gridData.description: If "true" divides all tab equally.

gridData.name: tab-position
gridData.description: Position of tab can be (top/bottom).  When Tab is used in card and tab-position is bottom , make sure footer property of card is false

gridData.name: header
gridData.description: Header for the Tab Layout.

gridData.name: body-height
gridData.description: Provides form body height

gridData.name: context-menu
gridData.description: Context Menu provides the list of menus on right click (for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

gridData.name: default-context-menu
gridData.description: If true add two context menus i.e close All and close Others tabs

gridData.name: action-type-align
gridData.description: specify position of action type(left/right).

gridData.name: enable-lifecycle-events
gridData.description: Enable lifecycle events example [all/init/ready/destroy].

gridData.name: active-bg-color
gridData.description: sets background color for active tab.

gridData.name: title
gridData.description: Title on Tab Pill.

gridData.name: disabled
gridData.description: Disable property for tab

gridData.name: active
gridData.description: Set true for specific tab open as default tab..

gridData.name: icon
gridData.description: Supports glyphicon only. Can add directly home instead of 'glyphicon glyphicon-home.

gridData.name: amexio-color
gridData.description: Font color for the tab label

gridData.name: closable
gridData.description: This flag will make tab closable, applicable for particular tab pills.

gridData.name: onClick
gridData.description: Callback to invoke on activated tab event.

gridData.name: rightClick
gridData.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu, providing tree node data and selected context menu data.

gridData.name: initiated
gridData.description: Event fired if 'all' or 'init' is set as input to enable-lifecycle-events.

gridData.name: ready
gridData.description: Event fired if 'all' or 'ready' is set as input to enable-lifecycle-events.

gridData.name: destroy
gridData.description: Event fired if 'all' or 'destroy' is set as input to enable-lifecycle-events.

gridData.name: addDynamicTab(title: string, amexio-color: string, closable: boolean, DyanmicTabComponent)
gridData.description: Method to add tabs dynamically.

gridData.name: closeAllTabs()
gridData.description: Method to close all tabs altogether (only if the closable property is true).

gridData.name: setActivetab(number: number)
gridData.description: Method to set tab active on the basis of tab sequence.(If tab index matches with input, method sets that tab active and returns true, else returns false)

gridData.name: setActiveTab(title: string)
gridData.description: Method to set tab active on the basis of tab title. (If tab title matches with input, method sets that tab active and returns true, else returns false

gridData.name: closeTabs(tabArray: array)
gridData.description: Method to close all other tabs(only if closable flag is true) , except few required tabs (those tabs title have to be added in array)

gridData.name: closeAll()
gridData.description: Method to close all tabs(even if closable flag is true)

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Should navigate over elements of step and read the name of step label.

gridData.name: Right Arrow && Down Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus from current tab  to the next tab.

gridData.name: Left Arrow && Up Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus from current tab  to the previous tab.

gridData.name: Home
gridData.description: Moves focus to the first tab and activates it.

gridData.name: End
gridData.description: Moves focus to the last tab and activates it.
